name: eyes_type
description: What type of eyes material should be loaded?
label: Eyes type
items: Use a simplistic PBR-style material for the eyes, without any procedural aspects at all. This is geared towards export to external applications.
Use a PBR-style material for the eyes, relying mostly on image textures and with few procedural aspects. This supports more of the general PBR model than the GameEngine material.
Use a procedural material, which allows dynamic color and feature adjustments
